useCase.name: Create Access Derivatives
useCase.description: Archivist selects digital objects for derivative creation and receives success notification.

preconditions.precondition: Archivist is logged in and has necessary permissions.

successEndConditions.condition: Derivatives are successfully created and metadata is updated.

mainSequence.step: Process selected digital objects with Object Management System
Create access derivatives with Derivative Creation System
Update metadata with derivative details using Metadata System
